data_table.description: ECG Serial Change, CEAD Form (CHD Cohort Surveillance). Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: CONTYR
variable.description: Contact year - surv. Record Seq. number [1] [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD28
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Type Of Suppression (6xx) - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD63
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Type of Suppression (6xx) - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD71
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Third or Last - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD126
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ED1 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD127
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ED2 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD128
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ED3 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD129
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ED4 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD130
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ED5 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD131
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ED6 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD132
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ED7 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD133
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. EV1 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD134
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. EV2 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD135
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. EV3 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD136
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. EV4 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD137
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. EV5 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD138
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. EV6 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD139
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. EV7 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD140
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. EV8 Pattern Met [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEADFLAG
variable.description: 1= CEAD form is present [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Presence

variable.name: CEAD05
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Q-QS Pattern (1xx) I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec, plus R amplitude more or equal to 3 mm in lead a VL
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec lead I or V6
QS pattern in lead I. Do not code in the presence of 7-1-1
Initial R amplitude decreasing to 2 mm or less in every beat (and absence of codes 3-2, 7-1-1, 7-2-1, or 7-3 between V5 and V6. (All beats in lead V5 must have an initial R > 2 mm.)
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/5 and < 1/3, plus Q duration ! 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6.
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec, plus R amplitude more or equal to 3 mm in lead aVL

variable.name: CEAD06
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Q-QS Pattern (1xx) II III aVF - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD07
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Q-QS Pattern (1xx) V1-V5 - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3 plus Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec in any of leads V2-V5
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec in any of leads V1-V5
QS pattern when initial R-wave is present in adj lead to the right on the chest, in any leads V2-V6
QS pattern in all of leads V1-V4 or V1-V5
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec, in any of leads V2-V5
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in any of leads V2-V5
QS pattern in all of leads V1-V3 (do not code in the presence of 7-1-1

Initial R amplitude decreasing to 2.0mm or less in every beat (and absence of codes 3-2, 7-1-1, 7-2-1, or 7-3) between any of leads V2 and V3, V3 and V4, or V4 and V5 (all beats in the lead immediately to the right on the chest must have an initial R > 2 mm
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/5 and < 1/3 plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 and < 0.03 sec in any of leads V2-V5
QS pattern in lead V1 and V2. (Do not code in the presence of 3-1 or 7-1-1.)

variable.name: CEAD08
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ST Segment Depression (4xx) I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping or U-shaped, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm but < 2.0 mm, and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6

variable.name: CEAD09
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ST Segment Depression (4xx) II III aVF - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in lead II or aVF
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in lead II
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping, or U-shaped, in lead II
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in lead II or aVF
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm but < 2.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in lead II or aVF
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in lead II

variable.name: CEAD10
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ST Segment Depression (4xx) V1-V5 - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1 - V5
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in any of leads V2 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping or U-shaped in any of leads V1 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1-V5
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1 - V5

variable.name: CEAD11
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. T Wave (5x) I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: T amplitude negative 5.0 mm or more in either of leads I, V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm

T amplitude negative or diphasic (positive-negative or negative-positive type) with negative phase at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm

variable.name: CEAD12
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. T Wave (5x) II III aVF - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: T amplitude negative 5.0 mm or more in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude negative or diphasic with negative phase (negative-positive or positive-negative type) at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead II; not Coded in lead aVF

variable.name: CEAD13
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. T Wave (5x) V1-V5 - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: T amplitude negative 5.0 mm or more in any of leads V2 - V5
T amplitude negative (flat), or diphasic (negative-positive or positive-negative type) with negative phase at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm, in any of leads V2 - V5
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase, in any of leads V3 - V5
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in any of leads V3, V4, V5; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: CEAD14
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ST Segment elevation (92x) I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in any of leads I, aVL, V6

variable.name: CEAD15
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ST Segment elevation (92x) II III aVF - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in any of leads II, III, aVF

variable.name: CEAD16
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ST Segment elevation (92x) V1-V5 - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in lead V5 or ST segment elevation more or equal to 2.0 mm in any of leads V1 - V4

variable.name: CEAD17
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. R Wave Amplitude (3x) - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Left: R amplitude > 26 mm in either V5 or V6, or R amplitude > 20.0 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVF, or R amplitude > 12.0 mm in lead aVL (All criteria measured only on second to last complete normal beat.)

Left (optional code when 3-1 is not present): R amplitude > 15.0 mm but less or equal to 20.0 mm in lead I, or R amplitude in V5 or V6, plus S amplitude in V1 > 35.0 mm (Measured only on second to last complete normal beat.)

variable.name: CEAD18
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. A-V Conduction Defect (6xx) - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Complete (third degree) A-V block (permanent or intermittent) in any lead. Atrial and ventricular complexes independent, and atrial rate faster than ventricular rate, with ventricular rate < 60
P-R (P-Q) interval more or equal to 0.22 sec in the majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF
Short P-R interval. P-R interval < 0.12 sec in all beats of any two of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF
Artificial pacemaker
Mobitz type II (occurrence of P-wave on time with dropped QRS and T)
Partial (seCondition degree) A-V block in any lead (2:1 or 3:1 block)
Wenckebach's Phenomenon (P-R interval increasing from beat to beat until QRS and T dropped)

Wolff-Parkinson-White Pattern (WPW), persistent. Sinus P-wave. P-R interval < 0.12 sec, plus QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec, plus R peak duration more or equal to 0.06 sec, coexisting in the same beat and present in the majority of beats in any of leads I, II, aVL, V4 - V6 (6-4-1 suppresses 1-2-3, 1-2-7, 1-2-8, 1-3-2, 1-3-6, all 3, 4, 5, 9-2, 9-4, 9-5 codes.)

variable.name: CEAD19
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Ventricular Conduction Defect (7xx) - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Incomplete right bundle branch block. QRS duration < 0.12 sec in each of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, and R' > R in either of leads V1, V2 (Code as 3-2 in addition if those criteria are met. 7-3 suppresses code 1-2-8.)
Intraventricular block. QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF (7-4 suppresses all 2, 3, 4, 5, 9-2, 9-4, 9-5 codes.)
R-R' pattern in either of leads V1, V2 with R' amplitude more or equal to R

Incomplete left bundle branch block. (Do not code in the presence of any cod able Q- or QS-wave.) QRS duration more or equal to 0.10 sec and < 0.12 in the majority of beats of each of leads I, aVL, and V5 or V6

Complete left bundle branch block (LBBB) (Do not code in presence of 6-1, 6-4-1, 6-8, 8-2-1 or 8-2-2.) QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, plus R peak duration more or equal to 0.06 sec in a majority of beats (of the same QRS pattern) in any of leads I, II, aVL, V5, V6 (7-1-1 suppresses 1-2-3, 1-2-7, 1-2-8, 1-3-2, 1-3-6, all 2, 3, 4, 5, 9-2, 9-4, 9-5 codes. If any other cod able Q-wave coexists with the LBBB pattern, code the Q and diminish the 7-1-1 code to a 7-4 code.)

Complete right bundle branch block (RBBB). (Do not code in the presence of 6-1, 6-4-1, 6-8, 8-2-1 or 8-2-2.) QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, plus: R' > R in V1 or V2; or QRS mainly upright, with R peak duration more or equal to 0.06 sec in V1 or V2; or S duration >R duration in all beats in lead I or II. (7-1 suppresses 1-2-3, 1-2-7, 1-2-8, 1-3-2, 1-3-6, all 2, 3, 4, 5, 9-2, 9-4, 9-5 codes)

variable.name: CEAD20
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Miscellaneous Items (9x) 1x - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Low QRS amplitude. QRS peak-to-peak amplitude < 5 mm in all beats in each of leads I, II, III, or < 10 mm in all beats in each of leads V1 - V6

variable.name: CEAD21
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Miscellaneous Items (9x) 3x - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: P-wave amplitude more or equal to 2.5 mm in any of leads II, III, aVF, in a majority of beats. 9-4-1 QRS transition zone at V3 or to the right of V3 on the chest. (Do not code in the presence of 6-4-1, 7-1-1, 7-2-1 or 7-4.)

variable.name: CEAD22
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Miscellaneous Items (9x) 5x - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: T-wave amplitude > 12 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, V1 - V6 (Do not code in the presence of 6-4-1, 7-1-1, 7-2-1 or 7-4.)

variable.name: CEAD23
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. U Wave (Blank) - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD24
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Suppression 8 - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD25
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Technical Problem (98x) - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Technical problems which interfere with coding
Technical problems which do not interfere with coding

variable.name: CEAD26
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Clear - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD27
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Suppression Pattern (6xx) - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD29
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Bundle Branch Block - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD30
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Major Q I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD31
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Minor Q I aVL V6 - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD32
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Major Q II III aVF - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD33
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Minor Q II III aVF - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD34
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Major Q V1-V5 - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD35
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Minor Q V1-V5 - 1st ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD40
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Q-QS Pattern (1xx) I aVL V6 - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec, plus R amplitude more or equal to 3 mm in lead a VL
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec lead I or V6
QS pattern in lead I. Do not code in the presence of 7-1-1
Initial R amplitude decreasing to 2 mm or less every beat (and absence of codes 3-2, 7-1-1, 7-2-1, or 7-3 between V5 and V6 (all beats in lead V5 must have an initial R > 2mm)
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/5 and < 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec, plus R amplitude more or equal to 3 mm in lead aVL lead I or V6

variable.name: CEAD41
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Q-QS Pattern (1xx) II III aVF - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD42
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Q-QS Pattern (1xx) V1-V5 - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3 plus Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec in any of leads V2-V5
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec in any of leads V1-V5
QS pattern when initial R-wave is present in adj lead to the right on the chest, in any leads V2-V6
QS pattern in all of leads V1-V4 or V1-V5
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec, in any of leads V2-V5
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec in any of leads V2-V5
QS pattern in all of leads V1-V3 (do not code in the presence of 7-1-1

Initial R amplitude decreasing to 2.0mm or less in every beat (and absence of codes 3-2, 7-1-1, 7-2-1, or 7-3) between any of leads V2 and V3, V3 and V4, or V4 and V5 (all beats in the lead immediately to the right on the chest must have an initial R > 2 mm)
Q/R amplitude ration=1/5 and < 1/3 plus Q duration =0.02 and <0.03 sec in any of leads v2-v5
QS pattern in lead v1 and v2 (do not code in the presence of 3-1 or 7-1-1)

variable.name: CEAD43
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ST Segment Depression (4xx) I aVL V6 - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping or U-shaped, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm but < 2.0 mm, and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6

variable.name: CEAD44
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ST Segment Depression (4xx) II III aVF - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in lead II or aVF
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in lead II
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping, or U-shaped, in lead II
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in lead II or aVF
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm but < 2.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in lead II or aVF

variable.name: CEAD45
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ST Segment Depression (4xx) V1-V5 - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1 - V5
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in any of leads V2 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping or U-shaped in any of leads V1 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1-V5
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1 - V5

variable.name: CEAD46
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. T Wave (5x) I aVL V6 - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: T amplitude negative 5.0 mm or more in either of leads I, V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm

T amplitude negative or diphasic (positive-negative or negative-positive type) with negative phase at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm

variable.name: CEAD47
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. T Wave (5x) II III aVF - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: T amplitude negative 5.0 mm or more in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude negative or diphasic with negative phase (negative-positive or positive-negative type) at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead II; not Coded in lead aVF

variable.name: CEAD48
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. T Wave (5x) V1-V5 - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: T amplitude negative 5.0 mm or more in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude negative or diphasic with negative phase (negative-positive or positive-negative type) at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead II; not Coded in lead aVF

variable.name: CEAD49
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ST Segment elevation (92x) I aVL V6 - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in any of leads I, aVL, V6

variable.name: CEAD50
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ST Segment elevation (92x) II III aVF - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in any of leads II, III, aVF

variable.name: CEAD51
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. ST Segment elevation (92x) V1-V5 - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in lead V5 or ST segment elevation more or equal to 2.0 mm in any of leads V1 - V4

variable.name: CEAD52
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. R (3x) - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Left: R amplitude > 26 mm in either V5 or V6, or R amplitude > 20.0 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVF, or R

Right: R amplitude more or equal to 5.0 mm and R amplitude more or equal to S amplitude in the majority of beats in lead V1, when S amplitude is > R amplitude somewhere to the left on the chest of V1 (codes 7-3 and 3-2, if criteria for both are present)
(Measured only on second to last complete normal beat.)

variable.name: CEAD53
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. A-V Conduction Defect (6xx) - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Complete (third degree) A-V block (permanent or intermittent) in any lead. Atrial and ventricular complexes independent, and atrial rate faster than ventricular rate, with ventricular rate < 60
P-R (P-Q) interval more or equal to 0.22 sec in the majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF
Short P-R interval. P-R interval < 0.12 sec in all beats of any two of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF
Artificial pacemaker
Partial (second degree) A-V block in any lead (2:1 or 3:1 block)
Wenckebach's Phenomenon (P-R interval increasing from beat to beat until QRS and T dropped)

Wolff-Parkinson-White Pattern (WPW), persistent. Sinus P-wave. P-R interval < 0.12 sec, plus QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec, plus R peak duration more or equal to 0.06 sec, coexisting in the same beat and present in the majority of beats in any of leads I, II, aVL, V4 - V6

variable.name: CEAD54
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Ventricular Conduction Defect (7xx) - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Incomplete right bundle branch block. QRS duration < 0.12 sec in each of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, and R' > R in either of leads V1, V2 (Code as 3-2 in addition if those criteria are met. 7-3 suppresses code 1-2-8.)
(7-4 suppresses all 2, 3, 4, 5, 9-2, 9-4, 9-5 codes.)
QRS duration more or equal to 0.10 sec and < 0.12 in the majority of beats of each of leads I, aVL, and V5 or V6 (Do not code in the presence of any cod able Q- or QS-wave.)

variable.name: CEAD55
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Miscellaneous Items (9x) 1x - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Low QRS amplitude. QRS peak-to-peak amplitude < 5 mm in all beats in each of leads I, II, III, or < 10 mm in all beats in each of leads V1 - V6

variable.name: CEAD56
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Miscellaneous Items (9x) 3x - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: P-wave amplitude more or equal to 2.5 mm in any of leads II, III, aVF, in a majority of beats. 9-4-1 QRS transition zone at V3 or to the right of V3 on the chest (Do not code in the presence of 6-4-1, 7-1-1, 7-2-1 or 7-4.)

variable.name: CEAD57
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Miscellaneous Items (9x) 5x - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: T-wave amplitude > 12 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, V1 - V6 (Do not code in the presence of 6-4-1, 7-1-1, 7-2-1 or 7-4.)

variable.name: CEAD58
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. U Wave (Blank) - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD59
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Suppression 8 - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]

variable.name: CEAD60
variable.description: [Cohort ECG Serial Change for Surveillance]. Technical Problem (98x) - Follow Up ECG [CEAD Form, contact 01]
variable.value: Technical problems which interfere with coding
Technical problems which do not interfere with coding
